item.title: Version 1.0.7
item.description: With its rich culture and traditions, beauty is ingrained in the Pakistani identity. Barbers represent a vital part of this identity, helping to not just provide hairstyling and cutting, but deliver confidence and social interactions. GharSe offers a marketplace to help deliver quality home-based barber services in Pakistan. It turns home-based barbers into micro-entrepreneurs by connecting them with local clientele
